attributes.action: Get organisations to stop banning Christmas and associated things.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many organisations have banned Christmas and things associated with Christmas due to some non-Christians will be offended. I know many people who aren't Christian, but do celebrate it or are not offended by the festival. In my local supermarket, the Christmas aisles are full of Asians buying trees, cards, decorations etc. I also know of some that have the turkey and all of the trimmings as well. Who has spoilt the fun for the majority? The people who are behind these decisions have not done their homework.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
